title: SpaceX plans key NASA demonstration for next Starship launch
summary: SpaceX could attempt a key demonstration for NASA during the third test flight of its towering Starship rocket, according to the federal agency.

title: SpaceX Pushes Ahead to Flight 3 with the Rollout of Ship 28
summary: After an exciting and milestone-achieving Flight Test Two, SpaceX is ready to move into Flight Three, with the opening of preflight testing via the rollout of Ship 28 to Suborbital Pad B. This will be the start of what is hoped to be a condensed testing campaign for Ship 28 and Booster 10 ahead of a flight early in 2024.

title: SpaceX completes static fire test in push toward third Starship launch
summary: The rocket and test equipment looked undamaged after the test.

title: Rocket Report: Vulcan stacked for launch; Starship aces test ahead of third flight
summary: "We look forward to flying our next crewed flight soon."

title: SpaceX kicks off Starship testing ahead of next test flight
summary: SpaceX has begun testing Ship 28 and Booster 10 as they look to fly the third Integrated Flight Test as soon as...

title: Starship’s 2023: after a year filled with milestones, Starship looks ahead to an exciting future
summary: The Starship Program had its biggest year to date in 2023, with two full stack flights, massive changes to the launch pad and surrounding systems, extending testing at Masseys, and massive changes to the production site.

title: With Solo Vehicle Testing Complete Flight 3 is Getting Closer
summary: Preparations for the third flight of Starship are making solid progress after both vehicles completed their respective solo test campaigns. Booster 10 rolled back to the Shipyard for final mods and checkouts before its flight, and Ship 28 wasn’t far behind. Both vehicles are now in their Bays for final work before rolling back to the launch site for integrated stack testing and launch.

title: SpaceX targets February for third Starship test flight
summary: SpaceX expects to conduct the third integrated test flight of its Starship vehicle in February as it works to demonstrate key technologies needed to land humans on the moon.

title: Wet dress rehearsal on the horizon for Starship’s third flight
summary: SpaceX is deep into preparations for the next Starship flight, focusing on the Orbital Launch Pad (OLP). Booster 10 and Ship 28 are set to return to the launch site in the coming week or two, ahead of a Wet Dress Rehearsal (WDR) that will set the stage for the third launch of the world’s largest and most powerful rocket.

title: Starship Flight 3 Fully Stacked for WDR testing
summary: SpaceX is making good progress on Flight 3 readiness with a full stack on the pad and road closures coming up for a possible Wet Dress Rehearsal (WDR) for Booster 10 and Ship 28. SpaceX continues to work on future flight vehicles, on the path towards achieving operational status with Starship.

title: Following aborted WDRs Flight 3 enters additional preparations
summary: After two Wet Dress Rehearsal (WDR) aborts, SpaceX opted to destack Ship 28 before removing Booster 10 from the Orbital Launch Mount (OLM). The Booster has since rolled back to the Production Site, while Ship 28 conducted  standalone testing on Pad B, opening with a Spin Prime test on Monday.

title: SpaceX nears third Starship launch clearance following FAA investigation closure
summary: SpaceX is nearing its clearance for the third Starship launch following the closure of a Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) investigation that was...

title: The next Starship mission has a tentative launch date: March 14
summary: This third flight has a reasonable chance of success.

title: SpaceX lands on potential date for next Starship test flight
summary: SpaceX has landed on a potential date for its next Starship test flight: March 14. Starship is SpaceX’s massive rocket that will...

title: SpaceX adds tests to next Starship flight
summary: SpaceX is planning a more ambitious set of in-flight tests of its Starship vehicle on its next launch to demonstrate capabilities needed for launching satellites and going to the moon.

title: Starship Eyes Mid-March for Flight 3
summary: SpaceX has begun the final prep work for a third flight of their Starship heavy lift reusable launch vehicle, with March 14 as the currently projected liftoff date, pending approval from the Federal Aviation Administration. The mission aims to demonstrate a number of key objectives for the program, including relighting Raptor engines in space and early payload deployment functionality.

title: SpaceX Targets March 14 for Third Starship Test Flight
summary: SpaceX is targeting March 14 for the next Starship Orbital Flight Test pending FAA approval. It will be the third flight of the gigantic rocket in less than a year […]

title: Launch roundup – Starship poised for third integrated test flight
summary: The focus of the week ahead is dominated, of course, by the much anticipated third test flight of Starship.

title: SpaceX continues progress towards Starship’s 3rd test flight
summary: SpaceX is at least two days away from the potential 3rd test flight of Starship. The company is still targeting the morning...

title: SpaceX cleared to attempt third Starship launch Thursday after getting FAA license
summary: Elon Musk’s SpaceX is preparing to launch its third Starship test flight as soon as Thursday morning after federal regulators signed off on the attempt.

title: SpaceX receives FAA launch license for 3rd Starship test flight
summary: The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) has given SpaceX its license to launch its massive Starship rocket on its 3rd flight test. While...

title: After Months of Preparations Starship is Ready for Flight 3
summary: Starship Flight 3 is set and ready to fly after months of preparations and SpaceX learning from the issues encountered during Flight 2. Booster 10 and Ship 28 are the most advanced pair of vehicles yet to be slated for an integrated test flight of Starship.

title: FAA Approves Third Starship Test Flight for Thursday
summary: The FAA issued a launch license today for SpaceX to conduct the third Orbital Flight Test (OFT-3) of their Starship rocket tomorrow, March 14. The date was announced last week […]
